mapper.insert: insert into tbl_video (video_upload_user, video_title, video_content, video_category, video_url, thumbnail_url) VALUES (#{videoUploadUser}, #{videoTitle}, #{videoContent}, #{videoCategory}, #{videoUrl}, #{thumbnailUrl})
mapper.select: SELECT V.video_id, V.video_upload_date, V.video_upload_user, V.video_title, V.video_content, V.video_like, V.video_category, V.video_view_count, V.video_url, M.user_display_name, M.user_profile_image, M.user_subscribe FROM tbl_video V JOIN tbl_member M ON V.video_upload_user = M.user_account WHERE video_id = #{videoId}

SELECT v.video_title, v.video_upload_user, v.video_view_count, v.video_upload_date, m.user_profile_image, v.thumbnail_url, v.video_id FROM tbl_video v JOIN tbl_member m ON v.video_upload_user = m.user_account
WHERE video_category = 'game'
WHERE video_category = 'life'
WHERE video_category = 'animal'
WHERE video_category = 'nature'
WHERE video_category = 'dance'
WHERE video_category = 'health'
WHERE video_category = 'music'
ORDER BY v.video_upload_date desc LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT v.video_title, v.video_upload_user, v.video_view_count, v.video_upload_date, m.user_profile_image, v.thumbnail_url, v.video_id FROM tbl_video v JOIN tbl_member m ON v.video_upload_user = m.user_account ORDER BY CASE WHEN v.video_category = #{type} THEN 1 else 2 END, v.video_upload_date desc LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT v.video_title, v.video_upload_user, v.video_view_count, v.video_upload_date, m.user_profile_image, v.thumbnail_url, v.video_id FROM tbl_video v JOIN tbl_member m ON v.video_upload_user = m.user_account WHERE v.video_upload_user = #{channelName} ORDER BY v.video_upload_date desc LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT v.video_title, v.video_upload_user, v.video_view_count, v.video_upload_date, m.user_profile_image, v.thumbnail_url, v.video_id FROM tbl_video v JOIN tbl_member m ON v.video_upload_user = m.user_account JOIN tbl_subscription s ON v.video_upload_user = s.sub_receiver WHERE s.sub_sender = #{account} ORDER BY v.video_upload_date DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
